name: 埃瓦尔德·赫林
bio_short: 德国生理学家，他对色觉和空间感知做出了根本性贡献。他提出了“拮抗处理”色觉理论（`hering_opponent_process_1878`），与“杨-亥姆霍兹理论”相辅相成。
bio_short_en: A German physiologist who made fundamental contributions to color vision and spatial perception. He is famous for the 'Opponent-Process Theory' of color vision (`hering_opponent_process_1878`), the great rival and complement to the Young-Helmholtz theory.
